channel.title: Replacing an item
channel.description: I added a donator cape to my server. I used the code for moonshine in place of my donator cape. 19842. ive changed it to that id in the cfg and items.add . How do I replace and add the model now? I have added the models to my c:/ cache. when I spawn it in game it is still the moonshine. please help!

item.title: Replacing an item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“itsconnor, post:11, topic:516080”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=634339.msg4282944#msg4282944 date=1365958526]
I do
[/quote]
mind if I pm you my info so you could take a look?[/quote]
Go for it
Unless you want the entire community to see it.

Read full topic

yes, Do you have teamviewer?

item.title: Replacing an item
item.dc:creator: @itsconnor itsconnor
item.description:
@itsconnor wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:516080”][quote author=itsconnor link=topic=634339.msg4282927#msg4282927 date=1365956566]

Do you have a renamed or non renamed client?
How to tell is if just about every file is ClassX_SubX_SubX
X being various numbers.
If renamed you wanted itemDef.java or itemDef_2.java
Non-renamed is Class8.java

I have itemdef and itemdef_2
[/quote]
Open them both and look for a custom item. It’ll most likely be in _2[/quote]
there are multiple custom items in there. thats where I added the donator cape too

Read full topic

How to tell is if just about every file is ClassX_SubX_SubX

[/quote]

item.title: Replacing an item
item.dc:creator: @itsconnor itsconnor
item.description:
@itsconnor wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You need to edit the ints inside the client to read the models.

thankyou. and how might I do that haha. the ints for the dcape are 5
